GUILDJOIN_DESCRIPTION: Join a guild requesting Founder or Guildmaster
PROVIDE_USER: **Mention founder/guildmaster or provide id of user**

LEAVING_GUILD:
Leaving guilds frequently is not advised
**You can join guild {{cooldown}}**

{{member}}, {{author}} **wants to join your guild.

NOT_FOUNDER: They are not founder/guildmaster of the guild.
